attributes.action: Clear national debt and budget deficit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should sell off a tiny fraction of the trillions of pounds worth of assets tied up in public/state owned works of art needlessly adorning the walls and halls of thousands of government buildings and properties and use the funds to clear the national debt and zero the budget deficit. No tax increases, no service cut backs, no job cuts.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. 

The title of your petition does not explain what your petition is about. Please rephrase the title to better reflect the content and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
